attributes.action: Insert a "None of These" box on all electoral ballot forms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under the present electoral system we have only the choice of who to vote FOR!
  Therefore, if only 3 votes are cast, the one who gets 2 votes wins, in much the same way as there will always be a number one record in the "Charts".
  A "None of These" box on ALL electoral forms would give the electorate an opportunity to demonstrate their dissatisfaction (if any) in the proposed candidates.
  These "no" votes should also be counted and declared.
